name: LD32 :: Mortpuno
description:
Mortpuno

Compo Entry for Ludum Dare 32 — April 17th-20th, 2015

My goal was to confront the player with a dilemma of choice, comparable to the moral catch questions, the german armed forces used to ask draft dodgers.

I wanted to elaborate on the silhouettes, the persuasion by the instructor as well as the music.

.:: Mild spoiler alert (maybe you want to play first before continuing) ::.
Because people keep asking: There is in fact an ending to discover, representing the "unconventional weapon" you always have at hand!

Thanks for playing!
GrIIIe


Made with
Unity,
Spine,
Photoshop,
Cubase, Band Garage,
Bfxr,
Gunfire Effects Generator (webaudio.prototyping.bbc.co.uk/gunfire/)
FreeFont (http://www.dafont.com/my-type-of-font.font)
